verifyRegKey

public java.lang.String verifyRegKey(java.util.LinkedList<RegKey> regKeylist)
Verify in windows registry keys if the VCEM key and strings was created successfully.

Parameters:
regKeylist - LinkedList containing the registry keys and strings to verify. *******************************************************************************

verifyRemovedFiles

public java.lang.String verifyRemovedFiles(java.lang.String VCEMInstallPath,
                                           java.lang.String HPSIMInstallPath,
                                           java.lang.String file)
Verify if the VCEM files was correctly deployed by VCEM installer after the installation.

Parameters:
VCEMInstallPath - - VCEM installation path (i.e. C:\Program Files\HP\Virtual Connect Enterprise Manager).
HPSIMInstallPath - - VCEM installation path (i.e. C:\Program Files\HP\Systems Insight Manager).
file - - local and name where is the file containing the list of deployed files.
Returns:
String containing all files that could not be found.

UninstallLogReader

public java.lang.String UninstallLogReader(java.lang.String fileName)
Perform the log verification, searching for errors and warnings in the text. The lines containing this 'tags' are saved in a string (except the default lines) and, returned to the user.

Parameters:
fileName - - address containing the direct link to the uninstallation log file.
Returns:
String containing the log verification results.

VerifyEnvVariables

public java.lang.String VerifyEnvVariables(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String value)
Perform the Environment Variables verification.

Parameters:
name - Environment Variable name.
value - Environment Variable value.
Returns:
String containing the Environment Variables verification results.
